thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellence at the Taj -
thread.title_full: Excellence at the Taj - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ian P
title: Excellence at the Taj -
text: Booked a 2 bedroom serviced apartment at the Taj Residences at Buckingham Gate. Excellent service, food and apartment quality and amenities. Location is excellent and arrangement of the premises around a courtyard is very attractive. Very minor issues encountered in a 5 day stay, overall a very enjoyable experience. Will definitely return and highly recommend the property. Only drawbacks are the proximity of a school and its playground, which can be very noisy for rooms closest to it.
